name: Divine Space, Unique Sci-Fi Action-RPG (Canceled)
blurb: Immersive universe of this sci-fi game is built based on real astronomical data. Build your ship to travel between real stars!

rewards.reward: No Reward

For early backers only: Divine Space Ringtone Pack and wallpapers. Also, get +100 to your karma and tonns of our love and gratitude by pressing 'like' button, share our project on FB or tweeting about us!
Previous reward tier + BACKER STATUS + THANKS IN CREDITS. On the forums, everyone will recognize you as a backer, thanks to whom Divine Space exists.

Previous reward tier + SATELLITE-ALLY + 3 MONTHS PREMIUM + RARE IN-GAME MONEY EQUAL TO $60. Satellite Ally is a unique in-game item that is exclusive for backers only. It will always be with you, fighting with your enemies.

Previous reward tier + SOUNDTRACK MINIPACK. This reward includes 5 soundtracks form the game in different styles, from techno to ambient. Please notice that soundtrack pack in $74 and $75 rewards is improved to whole 15 soundtracks!

Previous reward tier + SATELLITE-ALLY TIER 2 + 6 MONTHS OF PREMIUM + DIGITAL ARTBOOK + RARE IN-GAME MONEY EQUAL TO $150. The ally from previous reward tier upgraded to tier 2 that can also repair your ship from time to time. The artbook contains concepts, interesting stories about game universe and characters, and behind the scene materials.

(INSERTED DIGITAL REWARD) Previous reward tier but INSTEAD OF PHYSICAL GOODS, YOU GET IN-GAME MONEY ON YOUR ACCOUNT. This reward for those who aren\u2019t interested in physical candies, but want more shiny coins on their in-game accounts and at the lesser price. Here, instead of money equal to $150, you will get $200! Please keep in mind that next reward tier - $75 - refers to previous (old) reward tier, $50.

$50 reward tier + AN EXCELLENT PRINT VERSION OF ARTBOOK + SOUNDTRACKS PACK + ACCESS TO DEVELPERS FORUM! The soundtrack pack contains 10 high-quality beautiful soundtracks in different genres. On the closed developers\u2019 forum, your ideas or questions will be always answered. Please add $15 for shipping outside of the US.

Previous reward tier + LIFELONG PREMIUM ACCOUNT + SATELLITE-ALLY TIER 3 + A MAGNIFICENT CRYSTAL + RARE IN-GAME MONEY EQUAL TO $300. The satellite from previous reward will be upgraded to tier 3 and will become twice as powerful as the previous one, both in combat and repairing. Crystal is a paperweight (or just a table decoration) with beautiful laser engraving inside, looking at which everyone surely will get excited.

Previous reward tier + IPAD BACK COVER instead of a crystal. Our artists designed a wonderful space view to turn your iPad into something special. If you don't want a crystal and have iPad, this option is for you! If you want a crystal too, add $35 and you will have both!

(INSERTED DIGITAL REWARD) Previous reward tier, tier but INSTEAD OF PHYSICAL GOODS, YOU GET IN-GAME MONEY ON YOUR ACCOUNT. This reward for those who aren\u2019t interested in physical things: instead of cover or crystal, box and artbook, you will get additional in-game money to your account in sum, equal to $400! Please keep in mind that next reward tier - $140 - refers to previous (old) reward tiers, $100 or $101.

One of the previous reward tiers of your choice + BOXED EDITION + EARLY BETA KEY! You will be able to play our game on a special super secret server and see how the game is being developed and improved. You will have a chance to take part in the development, send suggestions and feedbacks and, sometimes, notice YOUR fixes and corrections in it! To make this tier even sweeter, your rewards and copy of the game will be sent to you packed into a splendid collection game box, exclusively for our backers only!

Previous reward tier + STAR WILL BE NAMED IN YOUR HONOR! Hurry up to be the first, the quantity is limited. Who knows, maybe in a couple of centuries, this star will indeed be so named, as it has already happened? Also, you will be able to test the game in its early development on special browser-based platform!

Previous reward tier + WEAPON OR DEVICE WILL BE NAMED IN YOUR HONOR. Instead of the star, WEAPON or DEVICE will be named after you and you will be included in the history of its creation. Please notice that star naming is not included due to limited amount of the stars in the first version that can be renamed

Previous reward tier + PLANET WILL BE NAMED IN YOUR HONOR. Instead of a star or equipment, a whole PLANET will be named after you and you will be included in its history as a historical figure - and become part of the game universe.

Previous reward tier + MINI-PORTRAIT OF YOU AS A PILOT! Instead of becoming a planet, you will become a CHARACTER in the game. You will be painted by our amazing artist (your photo is required) and become a living part of the game! Beside that, in the MMO version this portrait will be available only to you (as your avatar picture). Also, we will send this picture to you in higher resolution so you will be able to use it as an avatar for social networks, forums and any other sites you wish.

Previous reward tier + MINI-PORTRAIT OF YOU AS A PIRATE! Instead of a simple pilot, your alter ego will be a terror of common pilots and wretched merchants! Of course, you'll get this picture in higher resolution for use as your personal avatar to imbue horror into your friends at any site you wish - and especially in the MMO version!

Previous reward tier + MINI-PORTRAIT OF YOU AS A CAPTAIN OF A SPACE BASE. Warning: VERY EXCLUSIVE! You will become a part of one of the story lines and will have lifelong privileges at this base (which is especially valuable for the MMO version). Impress everyone by your power and authority!

Previous reward tier + MINI-PORTRAIT OF YOU AS A SCIENTIST. Warning: SUPER EXCLUSIVE! There are two scientists and they are super important characters of the global storyline. All the players will necessarily meet them. In the MMO version, you will have super secret abilities (not affecting game balance) that will be revealed only to you.

Previous reward tier + MINI-PORTRAIT OF YOU AS A CHIEF 'VILLAIN' OR COMMANDER. Warning: EXTREMELY EXCLUSIVE! Those are the main heroes of the game. The choice is given to the first one to get this reward, but both of them are simply stunning. In the MMO version, you will have exclusive political powers that will affect the whole universe.

Previous reward tier + SHIP OF YOUR OWN DESIGN + MINI-PORTRAIT OF YOU AS A CONSTRUCTOR. Instead of a Commander or chief 'villain', you will be a constructor, but you will be able to participate in designing a ship. This means you will tightly work together with us and our artists to make a constructor of your dreams. Of course, you will be included in the history of the ship too. In the MMO version, everyone who will buy parts of this ship will pay you taxes in game money!

A special offer for the real fans of space exploration and science who may be not particularly interested in games but space per se. We will give... No, not a reception in your honour. We'll give you a unique opportunity to go on a four-day visit to one of the most mysterious objects - the Baikonur space launching site where you will be able to watch a real launch of a spacecraft (of course, along with the game designer of 'Divine Space'). An unforgettable experience is guaranteed. That's it! And, in addition, you'll get the $2,000 reward level
